thread.title: A Detailed Look at the adidas by kolor Response TR Pack
thread.title_full: A Detailed Look at the adidas by kolor Response TR Pack

author: Jesse Bernard
title: A Detailed Look at the adidas by kolor Response TR Pack
text:
Visit the original post to see all 5 images from this gallery. 
adidas and Japanese brand kolor are back on another collaborative collection for Spring/Summer 2017. The performance line this season also features the Response TR in two vibrant colorways.
Both are more toned down than previous models, and the result mixes earth tones and bright hues in a stretch mesh upper and a flexible FITBAND for comfort while placing a mix of boost on the midsole and Continental TRAXION on the outsole.
Both styles are available now online at Packer Shoes for $220:
Shop Now In other sneaker related news, Raf Simons and adidas just dropped a new pair of slides.
